headline: PPG Industries (PPG): Margin Decline to 8.1% Challenges Bullish Views Despite Attractive Valuation
summary: PPG Industries (PPG) posted annual earnings growth averaging 2.4% per year over the last five years, with its latest net profit margin at 8.1%, slipping from 9.4% previously. While earnings are projected to rise 11.53% per year, this pace trails the broader US market’s anticipated 15.6% growth. Revenue is expected to increase 3.1% per year, below the market average of 10.2%. For investors, ongoing profit and revenue gains, alongside an attractive dividend and valuation multiples that compare...

headline: PPG, Universal Display Corporation celebrate 25 years of partnership with community donations
summary: PITTSBURGH, October 30, 2025--PPG and Universal Display Corporation celebrate 25 years of partnership with donations to Boys & Girls Clubs of Mercer County.

headline: PPG Industries Inc (PPG) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Record EPS Amidst Challenging Market ...
summary: PPG Industries Inc (PPG) reports strong financial performance with record-high EPS and continued sales growth, despite facing headwinds in the automotive refinish sector.
